definition: clap one's hands or shout after performances to indicate approval

positive_examples: This is an example of clapping.
We observed clapping in this context.
A typical case of clapping would involve these features.
The concept of clapping applies here.
A hand gesture involving repeatedly bringing both palms together to produce sound, typically to show appreciation.
negative_examples: This is an example of waving, not clapping.
This represents hand gesture in general.
The document was filed in the cabinet.
She walked to the store to buy groceries.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: Waving, or other types of HandGesture
